LanguageData.PsychicRitualQuality.label: psychic ritual quality
LanguageData.PsychicRitualQuality.description: How much nearby buildings improve quality of psychic rituals performed here.
LanguageData.PsychicRitualQualityOffset.label: psychic ritual quality offset
LanguageData.PsychicRitualQualityOffset.description: An offset applied to psychic ritual quality when this person participates. The total quality offset is divided by the total number of participants.
